page.title: 21A pupil's view today
page.content:
I go to Hale Primary school it is November 2011. Today i am wearing my school uniform which is a grey dress with a white shirt and a green cardigan. I also am wearing grey tights and my new black school shoes. School starts at 9.00am and i am in year three. School ends at 3.15pm. When i go home i do my homework and play games on the computer and on the wii. Sometimes i play outside on my trampoline. I go to bed at 7.30pm.
molly
